docs.title: Home
Welcome to the documentation of API_BackOficce

docs.text: Register Login Reset Password Refresh Access
docs.title: Authe

docs.text: Login Description Success Response Error Response URL : /auth/login Method : POST Description Use to connect to PostgreSQL Database with email and password Data constraints { "email": "valid email address": string, "password": "password in plain text": string } Data example { "email": "kylianG@gmail.com", "password": "azerty2-", } Success Response Code : 200 OK Content { 'accessToken': RjY2NjM5NzA2OWJjuE7c, 'expires_in': '1800s', 'tokenType': 'Bearer' } Error Response Status Condition Response 403 If your email does not exist in PostgreSQL Database { status: "403", message: "403 User not found" } 500 Error with PostgreSQL Database { status: "500", message: "500 an error was detected" } 500 An error with the password { status: "500", message: "500 error while generating the salt" }
docs.title: Login

docs.text: Use to connect to PostgreSQL Database with email and password Data constraints { "email": "valid email address": string, "password": "password in plain text": string } Data example { "email": "kylianG@gmail.com", "password": "azerty2-", }
docs.title: Description

docs.text: Status Condition Response 403 If your email does not exist in PostgreSQL Database { status: "403", message: "403 User not found" } 500 Error with PostgreSQL Database { status: "500", message: "500 an error was detected" } 500 An error with the password { status: "500", message: "500 error while generating the salt" }
docs.title: Error Response

docs.text: Reset Password Description Success Response Error Response URL : /auth/refreshaccesstoken Method : GET Description Use to refresh your access token in PostgreSQL Database Header { "tokenid": "'Bearer' + RefreshToken" : string } Success Response Code : 200 OK Content { 'accessToken': RjY2NjM5NzA2OWJjuE7c, 'expires_in': '1800s', 'tokenType': 'Bearer' } Error Response Status Condition Response 500 Error with jwt { status: "401", message: "401 jwt not found" }
docs.title: Refresh Access Token

docs.text: Use to refresh your access token in PostgreSQL Database Header { "tokenid": "'Bearer' + RefreshToken" : string }
docs.title: Description

docs.text: Status Condition Response 500 Error with jwt { status: "401", message: "401 jwt not found" }
docs.title: Error Response

docs.text: Register Description Success Response Error Response URL : /auth/register Method : POST Description Use to create a user in PostgreSQL Database with email and password Data constraints { "email": "valid email address": string, "password": "password in plain text": string } Data example { "email": "kylianG@gmail.com", "password": "azerty2-", } Success Response Code : 200 OK Content { 'refreshToken': AYjcyMzY3ZDhiNmJkNTY, 'accessToken': RjY2NjM5NzA2OWJjuE7c, 'expires_in': '1800s', 'tokenType': 'Bearer' } Error Response Status Condition Response 403 If your email already exist in PostgreSQL Database { status: "403", message: "403 Your email already exists" } 500 Error with PostgreSQL Database { status: "500", message: "500 an error was detected" } 500 An error with the password { status: "500", message: "500 error while generating the salt" }
docs.title: Register

docs.text: Use to create a user in PostgreSQL Database with email and password Data constraints { "email": "valid email address": string, "password": "password in plain text": string } Data example { "email": "kylianG@gmail.com", "password": "azerty2-", }
docs.title: Description

docs.text: Status Condition Response 403 If your email already exist in PostgreSQL Database { status: "403", message: "403 Your email already exists" } 500 Error with PostgreSQL Database { status: "500", message: "500 an error was detected" } 500 An error with the password { status: "500", message: "500 error while generating the salt" }
docs.title: Error Response

docs.text: Reset Password Description Success Response Error Response URL : /auth/resetpassword Method : POST Description Use to reset your password in PostgreSQL Database Header { "tokenid": "'Bearer' + AccessToken : string } Data constraints { "password": "password in plain text": string } Data example { "password": "azerty2-", } Success Response Code : 200 OK Content { 'status': 200, 'expires_in': 'Ok', } Error Response Status Condition Response 500 Error with PostgreSQL Database { status: "500", message: "500 an error was detected" } 403 If your id does not exist in PostgreSQL Database { status: "403", message: "403 User not found" } 500 An error with the password { status: "500", message: "500 error while generating the salt" }
docs.title: Reset Password

docs.text: Use to reset your password in PostgreSQL Database Header { "tokenid": "'Bearer' + AccessToken : string } Data constraints { "password": "password in plain text": string } Data example { "password": "azerty2-", }
docs.title: Description

docs.text: Status Condition Response 500 Error with PostgreSQL Database { status: "500", message: "500 an error was detected" } 403 If your id does not exist in PostgreSQL Database { status: "403", message: "403 User not found" } 500 An error with the password { status: "500", message: "500 error while generating the salt" }
